The price of the LG W31 is Exp. ৳14,000. W31 version smartphone comes with 6.52 inches, 102.6 cm2 (~80.9% screen-to-body ratio), IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors display, and resolution 720 x 1600 pixels. LG W31 is equipped with Octa-core 2.0 GHz Cortex-A53, both are seated on the MediaTek MT6762 Helio P22 (12 nm)chipset. Realme 7 has an internal memory of 32 GB, which can keep a lot of files and data of the user. This stylish device has 12 MP, 5 MP, 2 MP camera in the back, and a 8 MP camera on the front side. It was powered by a standard 4000 mAh Li-polymer battery.

Lenovo Tab P11 in Bangladesh / BD Price October, 2024

The price of the Lenovo Tab P11 is BDT 20,000. Tab P11 tablet/tab comes with 11.0 inches, 344.4 cm2 (~81.8% screen-to-body ratio), IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors display, and a resolution are 1200 x 2000 pixels, 5:3 ratio (~212 ppi density). Tab P11 performing Octa-core (4×2.3 GHz Kryo 260 Gold & 4×1.8 GHz Kryo 260 Silver), Qualcomm SM6115 Snapdragon 662 (11 nm) processor. It has 4/6 GB of RAM and 64/128 GB internal storage, which can be expanded to microSDXC external storage. This stylish device has a 13 MP camera in the back, and an 8 MP camera on the front side. It was powered by a standard 7700 mAh Li-polymer battery.
